alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 8:42PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Campbell and southwestern Crook Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 841 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Camplex Event Facility, or 6 miles northeast of Gillette, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rozet around 900 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Moorcroft, Keyhole Reservoir and Pine Haven. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 124 and 164. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
